name: @centigrade/ngtx
description: The Angular Testing Extensions is a small set of functions, aiming to make your life easier, when testing Angular components.

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run build:mjs && npm run build:umd
scripts.build: shx cp package.json dist/package.json && shx cp README.md dist/README.md && node buildhelper/package-json-preparer.js package.json dist/package.json
scripts.publish: npm run test && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.publish:alpha: npm run test && cd dist && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.publish:preview: shx mkdir -p ./out && cd dist && npm pack && shx mv -f *.tgz ../out/

author: Julian Lang <julian.lang@centigrade.de>
